#Assingment

::: {.cell hash='02_statistics_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_06f534665d2ba9fd892fd75272eba482'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(magrittr) 
library(dplyr) 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```

Attache Paket: 'dplyr'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Die folgenden Objekte sind maskiert von 'package:stats':

    filter, lag
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Die folgenden Objekte sind maskiert von 'package:base':

    intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
random_vars <- readRDS("data/random_vars.rds")

View(random_vars)

mean_var1 <- mean(random_vars$age)
variance_var1 <- var(random_vars$age)
std_var1 <- sd(random_vars$age)

mean_var2 <- mean(random_vars$income)
variance_var2 <- var(random_vars$income)
std_var2 <- sd(random_vars$income)

print(mean_var1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 33.471
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print(variance_var1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 340.6078
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print(std_var1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 18.45556
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print(mean_var2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 3510.731
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print(variance_var2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 8625646
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print(std_var2)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 2936.945
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
covariance <- cov(random_vars$age, random_vars$income)
correlation <- cor(random_vars$age, random_vars$income)

print("covariance")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "covariance"
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print(covariance)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 29700.15
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print("correlation")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "correlation"
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
print(correlation)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.5479432
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
df_sub18 <- subset(random_vars, age >= 18)
df_sub18_65 <- subset(random_vars, age >= 18 & age <= 65)
df_sub65 <- subset(random_vars, age <= 65)

mean_df_sub18 <- mean(df_sub18$income)
mean_df_sub18_65 <- mean(df_sub18_65$income)
mean_df_sub65 <- mean(df_sub65$income)

mean_df_sub18
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 4464.027
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mean_df_sub18_65
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 4691.378
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mean_df_sub65
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 3625.972
```
:::
